name: SIA ENGINEERING (PHILIPPINES) CORPORATION
about: SIA Engineering (Philippines) Corporation is a state-of-the-art Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul (MRO) facility located at Clark, Philippines, near Diosdado Macapagal International Airport. As a wholly-owned subsidiary of SIA Engineering Company, it specializes in base and line maintenance, with certifications from multiple airworthiness authorities including the Civil Aviation Authority of Philippines, Federal Aviation Administration, and European Aviation Safety Agency. The facility features two narrow-body hangars and one wide-body hangar, capable of servicing aircraft such as the A320, A330, and Boeing 777. With a team of highly competent mechanics, inspectors, and technical instructors, SIA Engineering (Philippines) is dedicated to delivering service excellence and supporting its growing roster of international airline customers. The company is committed to providing integrated MRO solutions, ensuring high-quality maintenance and timely redelivery of aircraft.
